messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] unschooling conference
messages.msgSnippet: ... From: Cheyenne Cain  I m having a challenge getting to the Live and Learn website for information on the conference. I ve tried
messages.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: Cheyenne Cain <cherokeecain@...>



I'm having a challenge getting to the Live and Learn website for
information on
the conference. I've tried accessing it from google and sandra dodd's
website.
No luck. Does anyone know when the deadline for registration
is?-=-=-=-=-


No deadline yet---you're still OK! We haven't even started TAKING
registrations yet!

Still a few kinks to work out. Looks as if we're almost there!

I'll post everywhere as soon as I'm ready to take your money!! I
promise! <g>

To access the site: www.liveandlearnconference.org

~Kelly

messages.subject: RE: [unschoolingbasics] Took her out
messages.messageBody:
<<<<<I just got off the phone with my school district to withdraw Moira from
school tomorrow. The lady first said I had to submit a curriculum within 30
days. I pointed out that school is not compulsory here until 1st grade,
which she double checked, then conceded. I do have to have my paperwork
filed by August 1 for next year. For this year, I just have to notify the
school she is in. So here we go down the yellow brick road.>>>>>

Congratulations, Judy.

Here is a "Curriculum" created by an Unschooler, Carol Narigon, which may
assist you with the formality.

http://sandradodd.com/unschoolingcurriculum.html

I think Pam has posted something similar which may be of use to you also.

Don't forget your local or Statewide organization for help with that too.

Robyn L. Coburn

--
No virus found in this outgoing message.
Checked by AVG Anti-Virus.
Version: 7.0.308 / Virus Database: 266.7.4 - Release Date: 3/18/2005

<temair@a...> wrote:
> I just got off the phone with my school district to withdraw Moira
from
> school tomorrow. <snip> So here we go down the yellow brick road.

Welcome to a wonderful and fun time in your lives!! (Oh and watch

messages.subject: Took her out
messages.msgSnippet: I just got off the phone with my school district to withdraw Moira from school tomorrow.  The lady first said I had to submit a curriculum within 30 days.  I
messages.messageBody:
I just got off the phone with my school district to withdraw Moira from
school tomorrow. The lady first said I had to submit a curriculum within 30
days. I pointed out that school is not compulsory here until 1st grade,
which she double checked, then conceded. I do have to have my paperwork
filed by August 1 for next year. For this year, I just have to notify the
school she is in. So here we go down the yellow brick road.

Judy


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re: unschooling conference
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks. I had tried accessing it from a google search. I couldn t remember if there was a deadline. I m rather gifted in the art of procrastanation so I need
messages.messageBody:
Thanks. I had tried accessing it from a google search. I couldn't remember if there was a deadline. I'm rather gifted in the art of procrastanation so I need plenty of notice for things, that way I have more time to procrastanate :)

Cheyenne







>
> cheyenne
>
Registration isn't even available yet (coordinator computer chaos)
and it is possible to register at the door (costs more but it's
available). Have you tried heading to it directly (typing in the
URL)? liveandlearnconference.org - I just tried it and the site is
up and running.
